name: responsible-frontend
description: A guide to building responsible frontend development

scripts.build:css: npm run scss-lint && npm run css:compile && npm run css:autoprefix && npm run css:minify && npm run css:lint
scripts.html:lint: htmlinspector test/html/index.html && htmlinspector test/html/base.html && htmlinspector test/html/form.html
scripts.html:save: curl http://localhost:5000/ > test/html/index.html && curl http://localhost:5000/base > test/html/base.html && curl http://localhost:5000/form > test/html/form.html
scripts.test: npm run html:lint && npm run test:css
scripts.test:css: npm run scss-lint && npm run css:lint
scripts.test:html: npm run html:save && npm run html:lint
